parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.68

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Math - Geometry

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks for intersection of terrain between two ASL positions. Same as [[terrainIntersectASL]], only returns intersect position instead of [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''terrainIntersectAtASL''' [pos1, pos2]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [pos1, pos2]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pos1: [[Array]] - start position in format [[PositionASL]]
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> pos2: [[Array]] - end position in format [[PositionASL]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - intersect position in format [[PositionASL]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_posASL = [[terrainIntersectAtASL]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[eyePos]] [[player]], [[getPosASL]] chopper];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[terrainIntersectASL]], [[lineIntersectsSurfaces]], [[intersect]], [[lineIntersects]], [[lineIntersectsWith]], [[terrainIntersect]], [[lineIntersectsObjs]], [[checkVisibility]]
</value></part></template>
